text:
OS: RHEL 5.5
Java: JRE 1.6u26  

catalina.sh has three occurrences of following line containing two equal signs which might prevent catalina.policy file from being loaded when using -security

-Djava.security.policy=="$CATALINA_BASE"/conf/catalina.policy 

I believe the line should be:

-Djava.security.policy="$CATALINA_BASE"/conf/catalina.policy
creator: code.poet@verizon.net
funkman@apache.org
